LIVERPOOL PLAYER RATINGS V ATALANTA

ALISSON BECKER 8

Saved twice early from Muriel, and again from Zapata in the second half. Did everything to ensure the clean sheet. Professionalism personified.

TRENT ALEXANDER-ARNOLD 8

An excellent outlet, and his passing had Atalanta on strings. Wonderful ball for Jota’s opener, and took advantage of the huge gaps the Italians left all over the field.

ANDY ROBERTSON 7

Defensively sound, and was able to let Alexander-Arnold do the bulk of the attacking work on the other flank. Got a nice breather too ahead of the weekend, which is a bonus.

RHYS WILLIAMS 8

Handed his first Champions League start, the 19-year-old certainly looked at home. Up against good players, he handled himself well. Good on him.

JOE GOMEZ 8

Defended well on the front foot and picked out a great pass for Jota’s second. Given a few problems, especially by the robust and lively Zapata, but that’s three clean sheets out of three in the Champions League, which will please Klopp immensely.

JORDAN HENDERSON 8

Loud, always available and accurate with the ball. Bossed the game for his team in midfield and deserved his rest.

GINI WIJNALDUM 7

Energetic and smart, purposeful and strong. Booked, but always in control of the game alongside Henderson. Allowed others to shine.

CURTIS JONES 8

Started brightly, and saw a left-footed effort kept out by Sportiello in the first-half. Strong and assured in possession, despite the odd mistake. He played the pass for Salah’s goal and got through all kinds of work off the ball. Nobody played more passes than he did. He’s 19, don’t forget.

MOHAMED SALAH 9

His threat kept Atalanta worried from the word go, and when his big chance came, he was devastating, racing clear and finishing superby. Set up Mane’s goal as well for good measure, and was denied a second goal by a good save. His pace was too much for the Italians.

SADIO MANE 9

Clinical finish for 4-0, and a pass from the heavens to give Jota his hat-trick. What a player. Those three together look something special.

DIOGO JOTA 10

How good does he look right now? Two brilliant first-half goals, and a brilliant second-half one as well. So confident, so sharp, so intelligent. So good. Flawless. One of the great European away performances from the Portuguese, who already looks like a Liverpool star.

quote.msg:
LIVERPOOL PLAYER RATINGS V ATALANTA

ALISSON BECKER 8

Saved twice early from Muriel, and again from Zapata in the second half. Did everything to ensure the clean sheet. Professionalism personified.

TRENT ALEXANDER-ARNOLD 8

An excellent outlet, and his passing had Atalanta on strings. Wonderful ball for Jota’s opener, and took advantage of the huge gaps the Italians left all over the field.

ANDY ROBERTSON 7

Defensively sound, and was able to let Alexander-Arnold do the bulk of the attacking work on the other flank. Got a nice breather too ahead of the weekend, which is a bonus.

RHYS WILLIAMS 8

Handed his first Champions League start, the 19-year-old certainly looked at home. Up against good players, he handled himself well. Good on him.

JOE GOMEZ 8

Defended well on the front foot and picked out a great pass for Jota’s second. Given a few problems, especially by the robust and lively Zapata, but that’s three clean sheets out of three in the Champions League, which will please Klopp immensely.

JORDAN HENDERSON 8

Loud, always available and accurate with the ball. Bossed the game for his team in midfield and deserved his rest.

GINI WIJNALDUM 7

Energetic and smart, purposeful and strong. Booked, but always in control of the game alongside Henderson. Allowed others to shine.

CURTIS JONES 8

Started brightly, and saw a left-footed effort kept out by Sportiello in the first-half. Strong and assured in possession, despite the odd mistake. He played the pass for Salah’s goal and got through all kinds of work off the ball. Nobody played more passes than he did. He’s 19, don’t forget.

MOHAMED SALAH 9

His threat kept Atalanta worried from the word go, and when his big chance came, he was devastating, racing clear and finishing superby. Set up Mane’s goal as well for good measure, and was denied a second goal by a good save. His pace was too much for the Italians.

SADIO MANE 9

Clinical finish for 4-0, and a pass from the heavens to give Jota his hat-trick. What a player. Those three together look something special.

DIOGO JOTA 10

How good does he look right now? Two brilliant first-half goals, and a brilliant second-half one as well. So confident, so sharp, so intelligent. So good. Flawless. One of the great European away performances from the Portuguese, who already looks like a Liverpool star.

近年通常利物浦場波打完我先睇重溫，兼飛住睇

唔關場波個結果係大勝關係
雖然兩隊都係對攻，對手中後場好多空位
但利物浦整體推進嘅流動順暢度同質素，比起過去兩年
明顯地好好多
過去兩年，利物浦班中前場球員基本上或多或少都係
偏向企定接／等波，企定交波，所以成日喺死位裡活動

根本呢班球員係夠班打互動組織技術型打法
雖然只係一場波，根本未長期真正做好磨合培養默契之下
都有噚晚嘅質素
好明顯
我認為之前一路嘅訓練方法

係三條線間，同隊友與隊友之間

美國大選重要州份綜合

德州：人口大量遷入，令人關注此州會否「變藍」，最終共和黨成功穩守此票倉，否則與提早宣佈落敗亦無差別。

愛荷華州：基本確定為共和黨囊中之物。不過得票差距較上屆收窄為一大警號。

俄亥俄州：本州為「鏽帶州份」之一，被傳媒視為指標州的本州近年事實已整體「染紅」，因此特朗普於後期拉開差距屬正常。

明尼蘇達州：希拉里上屆僅以些微差距獲勝，但此州為BLM運動起源地，此州本身與愛荷華州相近，愛荷華州優勢收窄下，此州民主黨守住為預料之中。

佛羅里達州：其中一個著名搖擺州份，拜登及特朗普初時「叮噹碼頭」，但隨後特朗普拉闊差距，現時未點算票數已不足翻盤，共和黨成功守住佛州。

亞利桑那州：由於人口大量遷入，本州正式「變藍」，特朗普與該州已故共和黨元老麥凱恩的爭議只為加大失守。現時此州已難以回天，特朗普勝算自此刻大減。

內華達州：本州正由民主黨領先，不過雙方差距較小，同時此州選舉人票較少。由於剩下的為郵寄票，估計最終此州仍為民主黨獲勝，但此州大多情況對勝負不大影響。

威斯康星州：早前提到的「鏽帶州份」之一，特朗普上屆意外贏得此州，不過優勢似乎未能保持。原本輕微優勢於該州大城市郵寄票點算過後，形勢逆轉，現時偏向拜登一方。若特朗普於本州落敗，則需全取以下四個州份才能獲勝。

北卡羅萊納州：特朗普上屆於此州獲勝，雖然曾一度於此州與拜登「五五波」，但現時情況特朗普勝出此州機會較大。

佐治亞州：本州同樣有大量外地人口遷入，於大城市點算票後，兩人票數差距較窄，即使現時仍偏向共和黨一方，但仍然有暗湧。

賓夕法尼亞州：「鏽帶州份」之一，但情況更複雜。本州與特朗普大幅領先的俄亥俄州相似，但有民主黨票倉知名大城市費城。特朗普暫時領先不少，但未點算的大城市郵寄票足以直接逆轉戰局。本州選舉人票較多，多年來被戲稱「搖擺賓州」，今次可謂真正「造王者」 。若最終「賓州定輸贏」，估計結果仍須待兩三天後才有。

密芝根州：「鏽帶州份」之一，此州與威斯康星州相近。威斯康星州被反超後，此州對特朗普事關重要，取勝必須守住上屆成果。現時郵寄票抵埗，特朗普的優勢大幅收窄，但與直接被反Cup的威斯康星州相比稍好，但仍不容樂觀。若特朗普最終於威斯康星州及此州落敗，剛才提到的內華達州則事關重要，否則取得「搖擺賓州」亦沒有意義。

特朗普形勢相當不利，應否DQ郵寄票之後或會「告上法庭」，需繼續關注。
